SMufoLib
  • Configuration
  • Edit on GitHub

Configuration

User defined default settings for SMufoLib are set in the configuration file smufolib.cfg and parsed by the config module. Detailed information on how SMufoLib handles configuration is provided in the following sections.

load(path='')[source]

Load parsed config file as dict.

If the path= parameter is an empty str or None, the following locations are checked in order:

  1. Current working directory

  2. Home directory

  3. Environment variable SMUFOLIB_CFG

  4. SMufoLib package directory

Parameters:

path (Path | str | None) – Path to smufolib.cfg

Return type:

dict[str, Any]

smufolib.cfg

The SMufoLib configuration file smufolib.cfg contains default settings for SMufoLib. It contains three main sections, with sub-sections denoted by a preceding dot, and settings for warnings, URL and file paths and colors.

[request]

This section contains configuration for the smufolib.request.Request class.

[request]
encoding = utf-8
warn = true

[metadata.paths]

Primary metadata paths are configured in this section.

[metadata.paths]
directory = https://raw.githubusercontent.com/w3c/smufl/gh-pages/metadata/
classes = ${directory}classes.json
glyphnames = ${directory}glyphnames.json
ranges = ${directory}ranges.json
referenceFont = https://raw.githubusercontent.com/steinbergmedia/
    bravura/master/redist/bravura_metadata.json

[metadata.fallbacks]

Metadata fallback paths are configured in this section.

[metadata.fallbacks]
directory = ./smufolib/metadata/
classes = ${directory}classes.json
glyphnames = ${directory}glyphnames.json
ranges = ${directory}ranges.json
referenceFont = ${directory}bravura_metadata.json

[cli.shortFlags]

Short flags for Command Line Interface options to be used with commonParser() are configured in this section.

[cli.shortFlags]
classData = -C
clear = -x
color = -c
exclude = -e
font = -f
fontData = -F
glyphnameData = -G
include = -i
mark = -m
overwrite = -o
rangeData = -r
sourcePath = -S
spaces = -s
targetPath = -T

[color.marks]

Color values for glyph marks are configured in this section.

[color.marks]
mark1 =
mark2 =
mark3 =

[color.anchors]

Color values for glyph anchors are configured in this section.

[color.anchors]
cutOutNE =
cutOutNW =
cutOutSE =
cutOutSW =
graceNoteSlashNE =
graceNoteSlashNW =
graceNoteSlashSE =
graceNoteSlashSW =
nominalWidth =
noteheadOrigin =
numeralBottom =
numeralTop =
opticalCenter =
repeatOffset =
splitStemDownNE =
splitStemDownNW =
splitStemUpSE =
splitStemUpSW =
stemDownNW =
stemDownSW =
stemUpNW =
stemUpSE =
